title: An ansvver to a challenge made by a Iesuite in Ireland Wherein the iudgement of antiquity in the points questioned is truely delivered, and the noveltie of the now romish doctrine plainly discovered. By Iames Vssher Bishop of Meath.
author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by the Societie of Stationers [and Eliot's Court Press, London],
